Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: The validator configuration file should reside in a more reasonable location
Issue.description: Currently, the configuration file for validator nodes is stored in {{/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/plenum/config.py}}. While this is technically Python, it really shouldn't be residing in this location. It is not obvious to anyone, nor does it follow any of the standard configuration file locations.On a Linux system, I would expect to find the configuration file in an {{etc/}} directory. I do know there is the possibility of creating another configuration file in {{.sovrin}}, but it's not clear which takes precedence.This does bring up the question of whether or not code-as-configuration is a good idea, but that's probably best served as a separate topic.
